body_html:
We are implementing better support for multi-GPU systems (available in tf.contrib.estimator), which will not rely on multiple processes.

I will close this issue, it is too diffuse as a feature request. Please reopen a new issue with concrete suggestions.

I will close this issue, it is too diffuse as a feature request. Please reopen a new issue with concrete suggestions.
body:
We are implementing better support for multi-GPU systems (available in `tf.contrib.estimator`), which will not rely on multiple processes. 

I will close this issue, it is too diffuse as a feature request. Please reopen a new issue with concrete suggestions.
